attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Norouz has been celebrated for 2500 years but London councils has decided to change and not allow Persians to celebrate 13bedar.

We are all signing this petition on behalf of all Persians in London to request a quick action against closure of parks in London and also a formal Norouz message from the mayor toward Persians living in London.

We, the undersigned, believe that the London councils should not close the parks so Persians can celebrate their 13bedar to the full as they have been doing it for the 2500 years.
